titles.title: A resolution recognizing the contributions of election workers across the country and the importance of their work to the democracy of the United States.
A resolution recognizing the contributions of election workers across the country and the importance of their work to the democracy of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the contribution of election workers across the United States. The resolution also recognizes that the work of election workers is critical to U.S. democracy.
